import './App.css'; import freeCodeCampLogo from './images/fcc_primary_large.jpg' import Button from './components/button.js' import Screen from './components/screen.js' import Clear_Button from './components/clear_button'; import { useState } from 'react'; function App() { const [input, setInput] = useState(''); const add_input = val => { setInput(input + val); }; return (
< Screen input ={input}/>
setInput('')} >Clear
); } export default App;
